memberdef.name: FI_INUSE_UNTIL_DEL
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* in use. will be explicitly reclaimed */

memberdef.name: FI_INUSE_UNTIL_TX
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* in use. will be reclaimed after Tx */

memberdef.name: FI_INUSE_UNTIL_FWD
memberdef.initializer: 3 /* in use until forwarded by AP */

memberdef.name: FI_INUSE_TRANSITION
memberdef.initializer: 4 /* being retrieved. do not delete in Rx ISR thread. */
